snippet.title: Infantry Online - Is this the best game ever invented?
snippet.description:
Infantry Online (http://www.freeinfantry.com/) is a massive multiplayer online (MMO) action game designed to support a multitude of player classes and game types such as old school favourites like Bug Hunt, Capture The Flag, No Mans Land, EOL and many more.

Players can team up with thousands of other games in whats often an unforgettable adrenaline pumping combat lasting hours. 

Infantry Online is an all-out frenetic action where battles featuring 100’s of players wage against each other. 

The game is easy to play and simple to get started. Infantry offers a quick blend of tactics and action unlike any other MMO.

The universe of Infantry chronicles a crumbling empire known as the Collective against a tide of independence movements, The Collective unified Earth after the holy wars of 2200 and expanded humanity throughout the solar system in a series of colonies as far as Pluto. After almost half a century of stability however the Collective is falling apart as the distant colonies seek more independence from central control.

Infantry Online was launched back in 1999 providing years of fun for thousands of players located around the globe, but has since shutdown making way for Free Infantry which was pioneered via a small community effort.

Today, we finance, maintain and grow Infantry Online into a bigger and better game.

Head over to http://www.freeinfantry.com/ to download the latest version of Infantry Online and join the Discord channel at https://discord.gg/2avPSyv to meet and chat with old players.

Peak times often bring 40-60 players with more joining each and every day.
